article.title: Alion to Provide Software Development and Life-Cycle Support to Maintain Army's Network Planning Terminal
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Alion Science and Technology has been awarded a subcontract to provide engineering and technical services to the U.S. Army Communications-Electronics Command at Fort Monmouth, NJ, in support of the Network Planning Terminal. The total value of the task order is in excess of $38 million.
